WorkItem.Description:
I tried using the Listbox GroupStyle with an Expander as my GroupItem and it doesn't seem to work with most all of the themes. It displays the Expander's header but the items do not show up...
 
<ControlTemplate TargetType="{x:Type GroupItem}">
<Expander IsExpanded="True" ExpandDirection="Down">
<Expander.Header>
<TextBlock>
<TextBlock FontWeight="Bold" Text="{Binding Path=Name}"/> (<TextBlock Text="{Binding Path=ItemCount}" />)
</TextBlock>
</Expander.Header>
<ItemsPresenter Margin="5,0,0,0" />
</Expander>
</ControlTemplate>
 
Any ideas about how to get this working?
WorkItem.Summary: Expander in Theme pack is broken when used as a GroupItem

Comments.Message:
I actually figured this one out a few hours later.... the problem was actually in the ListBox's ControlTemplate in many of the themes.
It looks like they are using:
<StackPanel Margin="1,1,1,1" IsItemsHost="true" />
Instead of:
<ItemsPresenter SnapsToDevicePixels="{TemplateBinding SnapsToDevicePixels}" />

Replacing the StackPanel with the ItemsPresenter makes the expander work just fine.
@docta5: Thank you for figuring this one out, it has been driving me nuts for days. The fix works perfectly.
